title: Kuo: Apple Car project reorganization critical to shipping in 2025 after team ‘dissolved for some time’
content:
Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo is back with another tweet. This time, Kuo says the Apple Car project team has been dissolved for “some time,” and it needs to have a reorganization within the next three to six months to achieve the goal of mass production by 2025.

more…

The post Kuo: Apple Car project reorganization critical to shipping in 2025 after team ‘dissolved for some time’ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Kuo says the Apple Car project team has been dissolved for "some time" and it needs a reorganization within the next three to six months.
